name: Drawer
description: Drawer is a panel which slides in from the edge of the screen.

properties.name: controlVisibility
properties.label: Control Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Enables showing the Open Drawer button.

properties.name: controlLabel
properties.label: Control Label
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the label of the Open Drawer button.

properties.name: placement
properties.label: Placement
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the placement of the drawer window.

properties.name: size
properties.label: Size
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the size of the drawer window.
properties.settingTooltip: Controls the size of the drawer window.

properties.name: backdropVisibility
properties.label: Backdrop Visibility
properties.settingTooltip: Enables showing the backdrop when the drawer window is opened.

properties.name: closeOnClickOutside
properties.label: Close On Click Outside
properties.settingTooltip: Enables closing the drawer window by clicking outside it.

properties.name: closeOnEscape
properties.label: Close On Escape
properties.settingTooltip: Enables closing the drawer window by pressing the Escape button.

properties.name: animationDuration
properties.label: Animation Duration (ms)
properties.settingTooltip: Specifies how long the drawer window opens and closes.

properties.name: isOpen
properties.label: Is Open
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the drawer window is open or closed.
properties.settingTooltip: Controls whether the drawer window is open or closed.

eventHandlers.name: onOpen
eventHandlers.label: On Open Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the drawer window has opened.

eventHandlers.name: onClose
eventHandlers.label: On Close Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the drawer window has closed.
